name: Hilsha Fish
description: A popular fish in Bangladesh, cooked in various ways including curries and fried dishes.

name: Biryani
description: A flavorful rice dish cooked with meat, spices, and sometimes vegetables.

name: Chapli Kabab
description: A type of kebab made with ground meat and spices, usually served with naan or rice.

name: Pitha
description: A type of sweet or savory cake made from rice flour and filled with various ingredients such as coconut, date palm jaggery, and sesame seeds.

name: Fuchka
description: A popular street food consisting of crispy shells filled with a spicy mixture of mashed potatoes, chickpeas, and tamarind water.

name: Beef Tehari
description: A spicy beef and rice dish, often served with a side of salad and pickles.

name: Bhuna Khichuri
description: A spicy rice and lentil dish, often served with meat and vegetables.
